name: Dice Line
description:
[Created for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam]

Description

Align same face dices in order to score points. You can align them in Rows/Columns/Diagonals.

The dice faces are being randomized automatically by the board so be careful what dices are in the positions that are going to be randomized.

Goal: High Score

Note: You were supposed to play against an AI, highest score at the end of the timer winning the game but unfortunately the AI stopped working close to submissions end.

Controls

  • Keyboard:

WASD/Arrows - Move around the board

Space - Select/Swap Dice

  • Mouse:

Left Click - Select/Swap Dice

Credits:

Laurentiu-Stefan Mures (Lawr)

Software Used:

Visual Studio

Unity
